segments.text: Well , sir . We are asking all our guests to wear a jacket and a tie in our restaurant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that so ? I didn't know it . can I possibly borrow a jacket and a tie ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry ; you can't borrow a jacket and a tie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then we'll return to the hotel and come back , will you change the appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , what time will you come back ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , we are waiting for you at 7 .
segments.speaker: S1
